metadata.title: Debit Card and ATM Card Declined Reason Codes
metadata.description: Numeric codes are declined on Base24, alphanumeric codes are declined on FAST
notes: If decline code is a number, decline was done on Base24
If decline code is a letter or number combination, decline was done on FAST
Transaction Description will begin with 'Rej' for rejected/declined transactions

no_transaction_posted_generic.title: No Transaction Posted (General)
no_transaction_posted_generic.text: Mr./Ms. Client, I understand how frustrating it is when your card gets declined. Upon reviewing your account, I do not see where a charge was presented to us for authorization, and I do not see any current block on your card. I have confirmed that your account is open and active for use. If you are using the card in person, please attempt to authorize the transaction by selecting the Credit option on the terminal. You may also attempt to swipe the card instead of inserting the card by the chip. If you are attempting the transaction electronically, kindly try the transaction again or at later time. If the issue persists, please contact the merchant directly for resolution.
no_transaction_posted_generic.notes: From SOP: No Transaction Posted guidance.

fraud_alert_block_removed_thanks.title: Fraud Alert Resolved - Thank You
fraud_alert_block_removed_thanks.text: Mr./Ms. Client, thank you for responding to the alert. I can confirm that the block has been removed and your card is ready for use. You may attempt your transaction again.
fraud_alert_block_removed_thanks.notes: From SOP: After client verifies fraud alert transactions.

card_not_activated_how_to_activate.title: Card Not Activated - How to Activate
card_not_activated_how_to_activate.text: I see that the ATM/Debit card you are attempting to use has not been activated. You can activate it in mobile or online banking, through the automated phone service or by making a PIN based transaction at an ATM or point of sale merchant.

rt_card_not_restricted_retry.title: RT Fraud Score but Card Not Restricted - Retry
rt_card_not_restricted_retry.text: I'm not seeing any restrictions on your card. Please try the transaction again or at a later time.
rt_card_not_restricted_retry.notes: SOP rule: Do not transfer to Fraud if Blocked Status shows Card Not Restricted.

expired_card_explain_and_offer_reissue.title: Expired Card - Explain & Offer Reissue
expired_card_explain_and_offer_reissue.text: Your debit card ending in {{last4}} is expired{{expiry_suffix}} which caused the decline. I can order your replacement card now. While waiting, please use another payment method.
expired_card_explain_and_offer_reissue.notes: Synthesized from Job Aid actions; {{expiry_suffix}} may be formatted like ' ({{expiryMMYY}})'.

wallet_delete_readd_tip.title: Wallet - Delete & Re-add
wallet_delete_readd_tip.text: If you use a mobile wallet, after you receive and activate the new card, please delete the old card from the wallet and re-add the new card to ensure payments work.
wallet_delete_readd_tip.notes: From Job Aid: wallet guidance for expired cards.

atm_invalid_non_bofa.title: Invalid ATM Selected - Use BofA ATM
atm_invalid_non_bofa.text: This decline occurred because the ATM isn't a Bank of America ATM. Please try a different ATM. I can help you find the nearest Bank of America ATM.

invalid_pin_options.title: Invalid PIN - Options
invalid_pin_options.text: It looks like the PIN entered wasn't correct. I can mail a PIN reminder, or you can visit a financial center to select a new PIN. If available, you may also try the Credit option to complete the purchase.

txn_type_not_allowed_linkage.title: Transaction Type Not Allowed / Linkage
txn_type_not_allowed_linkage.text: That transaction type isn't allowed for this card/account linkage. I'll check the linked accounts and update the linkage if needed; then please try again.
